dialogueTree.title: Logic: "These are the same belts as the one..."
dialogueTree.text: These are the same belts as the one the victim was hanged with.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "I knew it was a cargo lashing belt!"
links.text: I knew it was a cargo lashing belt!

links.title: You: ""Look, lieutenant. The same belts a..."
links.text: "Look, lieutenant. The same belts as the one the victim was hanged with. Says *Vermillion* on the side..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. This is probably whe..."
links.text: "You're right. This is probably where Titus and his men got the belt." The lieutenant looks at the pile.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""More ammo on our belt for the rema..."
links.text: "More ammo on our belt for the remainder of the investigation. Good find, detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right." The lieutenant look..."
links.text: "You're right." The lieutenant looks at the pile. "This certainly confirms the theory that the belt must've come from inside the harbour."

links.title: You: "The same exact belts. Even the same..."
links.text: The same exact belts. Even the same writing...

links.title: Logic: "Indeed, it appears so. This is wher..."
links.text: Indeed, it appears so. This is where the belt came from.
